Key Arguments: The author believes that government and medical recommendations during the COVID-19 pandemic were ineffective and dangerous.
The author claims that early treatments for COVID-19 were suppressed and that medical professionals who spoke out were marginalized.
The author expresses distrust in government, corporations, and the medical profession due to their handling of the pandemic.
The author argues that COVID-19 vaccines are causing adverse health effects and that these should be investigated by regulatory bodies.
The author criticizes the influence of pharmaceutical companies on government decisions.
The author believes that the proposed legislation represents government overreach and a power grab.
Main Themes: Distrust in government and medical authorities
Opposition to government overreach and new powers
Notable Quotes: I feel compelled to judge any future actions and powers that our government may bestow upon itself with the recent failures and coverups of the past.
It must be remembered that throughout this 'pandemic' the rarest commodity has been the truth.
These layers have been eroded by Government overreach which started many years in the past but is accelerating at 'Warp' speed in our current era.
